TextView.android:text: Welcome aboard, budding debuggers, as we take you through ninety minutes of frenzied debugging where you compete with the best of them to determine the top-notch debuggers! It is one thing to write clean and precise codes and a completely different one to understand the psychology behind pre-written codes and find bugs in them. \n \n“Segmentation Fault” is your best friend? Tons of patience is what you have? Thoughts of giving up stay away from you? This is the event to master.
